name: Find the treasures
description:
In Find the treasures you must explore colorful wastelands and find a certain number of treasures. These treasures are hidden, but they are pretty much asking to be found. You will spot their glares at the horizon and hear their funny (yet horrid) voices. Behold ... NOT! You cannot be harmed, even when falling at the edge of this world. So enjoy hopping around the highest mountains!

The game features several procedural generated contents (terrain, scenery, treasure locations) and was submitted to PROCJAM2018.
